contentList.content: Hotkey for toggling the mod on/off
Hotkey for toggling the companion AI on/off
If checked, the game will automatically pause when the character the player is controlling goes down
The AI's turn length, in milliseconds. The default is 6000, meaning the AI will act once every 6 seconds. Higher values make combat easier, lower values make combat harder.
If checked, the companion AI will control ALL player characters, including the active character.
Hotkey for toggling Full Auto on and off
Increase or decrease the health of all units (players and enemies) by this factor, e.g. a value of 3 will triple all health values.
If checked, your characters will queue up actions during pause, and fire them when unpaused, similar to how combat worked in Baldur's Gate 1 and 2.
High-level behavior for the companion AI. All-Out Attack: kill or be killed. Stick Together: prioritize staying with the group, don't run off alone to attack.

The companion AI will use spells only of this spell level or lower (for example, if set to 3, the AI will use spells of levels 1, 2, and 3). If set to 0 (the default), the AI will only use cantrips and will not deplete your spell slots.
Companion AI Maximum Allowed Spell Level
If checked, the companion AI will freely use any of their spells/abilities with zero resource costs.
